lines.text: Of course you know, this means *WAR*!

[disguised as a bobby-soxer]
Oh, Mr. Jones! Franky and Perry just aren't in it! You're my swooner dreamboat loverboy!

[as Bugs enters the concert hall wearing a white wig and tuxedo]
Leopold!

[singing, playing banjo]
Whadda dey do on a rainy night in-a Rio?/A-rikki-biggi-bik/Whadda dey do when dere is no starry sky?/Oh, starry sky!/Where do dey when dey can't go for a walk/Do dey stay home and talk?/Or do dey sit inside?

[Jones is glaring at him]
Eh, what's up, Doc?
[Jones grabs Bugs by the neck, places him in the harp and slams the harp shut over his neck, then exits]

[referring to Jones]
Hmm, also a rabbit hater. Oh, well.
[Jones had smashed Bugs' banjo over his head for interrupting his singing practice]
